title: Past Events
text:
Here‚Äôs a look at the events we‚Äôve hosted:


A cozy summer evening in Volunteer Park with candlelit picnic tables, a poetry reading corner, and acoustic music.



We welcomed spring with a floral-themed gathering at Gas Works Park. Guests brought their favorite blooms to exchange.



An intimate indoor meet-up at a Capitol Hill lounge, complete with board games, warm drinks, and deep conversation prompts.
Back to Home

title: Temp Tats Pop-Up
text:
Upcoming Event 

 
 
Temp Tats Pop-Up 
 
Sun ‚Ä¢ Sep 21, 2025 
11:00 AM ‚Äì 7:00 PM 
Boston Common 

 
Arist Sign-Up 
RSVP 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
    About the Event 
ü¶ë If you fit any of the following categories, boy do I have an event for you!!
Wants a tattoo but isn't ready to commit / drop the funds
Likes supporting cool artists
Picnic girlies OR aspiring picnic girlies
Is down to mingle & yap & make new friends

üêâ THE VISION: All-day picnic featuring local artists doing temporary tattoos!
Bring a picnic blanket + a snack to share if u can
Invite all your friends!! Can we make this a mega-picnic?!?!
Drop in whenever <3

üçâ Suggested donations for temporary tattoos will be $5-20+ (depending on design). All proceeds will go toward Gaza relief efforts.

üåô Stay tuned for more info, including artist intros + schedule drop!

ü¶¶ RSVP by Tues 9/16 for a trinket :)


 
    Meet the Artists 




    
    Thao-Vy 
    (she/her)
    Tattoo Medium: Marker
    Time: 11:00 AM - 7:00 PM



    
    Mika 
    Tattoo Medium: Marker, Henna
    Time: 11:00 AM - 7:00 PM
    mikaichikiwelches.com



    
    aros l 
    Tattoo Medium: Marker
    Time: 3:00 - 7:00 PM



    
    Allison
    Tattoo Medium: Marker
    Time: 3:00 - 7:00 PM
    alliylau.com



    
    Izzy 
    (Any)
    Tattoo Medium: Marker, Stencil
    Time: 11:00 AM - 7:00 PM



    
    Waka Okuda 
    Tattoo Medium: Marker
    Time: 11:00 AM - 5:00 PM



    
    Christina Wu
    Tattoo Medium: Henna
    Time: 1:00 - 7:00 PM



    
    Iman Moreira
    Tattoo Medium: Henna
    Time: 11:00 AM - 5:00 PM



    
    Aaron Fu
    Tattoo Medium: Marker
    Time: 5:00 - 7:00 PM



    
    Ray 
    Tattoo Medium: Marker
    Time: 11:00 AM - 7:00 PM



    
    Andrea Huang 
    (she/her)
    Tattoo Medium: Marker
    Time: 11:00 AM - 3:00 PM




 
    Donations 
    All proceeds for the TempTats Pop-Up event will go to the following Gaza relief efforts.



  Ahmed Raed
  (shared by a dear friend of mine)
  I am Ahmed from the besieged city of Gaza, I am 16 years old and I have a family of 7 members. We have been living in a genocide for more than 21 months. The bombing, killing and massacres do not stop.

  Every day they kill more than 100 children and women. We are suffering a lot. We do not have food or drink and we do not have anything. We left our homes and did not take anything with us. They destroyed our homes, our dreams and our memories. Here in Gaza we die 100 times a day. We could die at any moment. We are now living in famine. We do not have food or anything to eat. I wanted to complete my studies and achieve my dreams, but the war came and destroyed everything. Now I ask you all to help me and my family to get food and water.

  We need $100 a day to be able to provide for food and supplies. Please help us reach this goal for us so we can have the supplies we need to survive.


Gaza Sunbirds
A Palestinian para-cycling team providing community-led aid in Gaza, including distributing essential aid, engaging in activities with youth, and managing a refugee camp.


Palestine Children‚Äôs Relief Fund (PCRF)
Provides urgent aid, including medical aid, treatment, food, water, and necessities for affected families. PCRF also focuses on rebuilding healthcare facilities and funding trauma counseling and mental health services to foster healing in the community.


World Central Kitchen
WCK has served more than 145 million meals in Gaza and is seeking to rapidly scale up production to an unprecedented one million hot meals a day.
